import React from "react" import * as axios from "axios" import classes from './Users.module.css' class User extends React.Component{ getUser(){ if (this.props.users.length === 0) { axios.get("https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/users") .then(response => { this.props.setUsers(response.data.items) }) } } render(){ // this.getUser(); return
Users{ this.props.users.map(u => (

{u.followed ? : }
{u.name}
{u.status != null ? u.status : 'Here need a status'}
{"u.location.country"}
{"u.location.city"}
)) }
} } export default User
